extendedInfo.description: *Have a problem with the app starting and staying blank with Samsung Galaxy S3.Work around by turning on Developer options and checking the box for 'Disable Hardware overlays'.--------This is an application that displays the number of days before the expected date of delivery and the number of weeks that have passed since pregnancy. Your baby on the screen becomes larger as the number of weeks increases. You can look at the baby floating inside the bubble which is surrounded by light. Your baby and the bubble moves when you touch the screen.The number of days and the number of weeks change automatically after a while. You can also change it manually by touching the screen.

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Please fix picture it only shows when you hit the exit button
reviews.author: Stephanie Strong

reviews.title: THIS APP SUCKS
reviews.comment: You cant even see the images untill you go to exit the app...DO NOT DOWNLOAS...PEICE OF CRAP
reviews.author: Jana Welch
